manifest.label: External secret (yaml)
manifest.placeholder: Input the external secret yaml here
manifest.description: This should be valid ExternalSecret yaml.

error.required: This external secret YAML is required.

yaml.malformed: This external secret YAML is malformed.
yaml.multiple: This input YAML contains multiple documents. It only supports one ExternalSecret resource
yaml.incorrectGroup: This external secret YAML is using an incorrect API group.
yaml.notExternalSecret: This external secret YAML is not an ExternalSecret.
yaml.noName: This external secret YAML is missing a name.
yaml.noSpec: This external secret YAML is missing a spec.
yaml.invalidName: The secret name must be lowercase alphanumeric characters, '-' or '.', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character.
yaml.duplicateName: The secret name is already in use.

projectIds.label: Assign to
projectIds.description: Overrides the namespace value in the secret configuration.

notification.success: Secret requested to be assigned successfully.

delete.title: Delete Secret
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? The action is permanent and cannot be undone.

deleteProjectSecret.title: Remove from project
deleteProjectSecret.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from the project? The action is permanent and cannot be undone.

notification.error: Failed to remove secret from project.

hint.actionPending: This secret is processing, please wait for it to be done before assigning.
hint.scope: Secret can only be assigned if organization-scoped.

hint.storage: This secret is associate with a storage configuration, if you want to remove this secret please remove the associated storages first.
hint.actionPending: This secret is processing, please wait for it to be done before deleting.

addProjectSecret.label: Add project secret
addProjectSecret.disabled: You cannot add a project secret since project is not ready.

statusReason.messageHeader: There was an error with this secret. The system returned the following error message:
